main event: A white object was observed hovering in Newport News and Carrollton, Virginia on August 9, 1961.
interesting points: The object maintained a constant bearing before disappearing to the south, The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes, The object was analyzed and considered possibly a balloon, meteor, or aircraft, Other observations noted include a bright object passing from west to east, and there was insufficient data for further evaluation.
witness description: A member of the National Guard reported observing the object.
